text: Athyana is a monospecific genus of plant in the family Sapindaceae, containing only Athyana weinmannifolia. It is found in Argentina and Bolivia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Sapindaceae Category:Monotypic Sapindaceae genera Category:Flora of Argentina Category:Flora of Bolivia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Athyana
